SAntyai# pArSvaqta A cCya#ti maddhyaqtO hi ma#nuqShyA# Aq cCyanti# tiraqScInaqmA cCya#tyanUqcInaq(gm)q hi ma#nuqShyA# AqcCyantiq vyAvRu#ttyaiq rakSha#sAM BAqgO#&sIti# sthavimaqtO baqrq.hiraqktvA&pA$syatyaqsnaiva rakShA(gm)#si niqrava#dayata iqdamaqha(gm) rakShO#&dhaqmaM tamO# nayAmiq yO$&smAn dvEShTiq yaM ca# vaqyaM dviqShma 
ityA#haq dvau vAva puru#Shauq yaM caiqva- [  ] 46
